name: Pure Boost
details:
The Mooer Pure Boost performs it's task with flying colors offering up 20dB+ of clean boost with ±15dB 2 band EQ. It even makes your tone not only louder but fuller and a bit more well rounded. Its full metal casing makes it durable and road ready, and like most great effects pedals it has true bypass.
20dB+ clean boost with ±15dB 2 band EQ
Nice embellishing of original tone
Full metal shell
Pedalboard friendly
True bypass

Input: 1/4" monaural jack (impedance: 1M Ohms)
Output: 1/4" monaural jack (impedance: 10k Ohms)
Power Requirements: AC adapter 9V DC (center minus plug)
Current Draw: 6 mA
Dimensions: 1.6535" (W) x 2.0472" (H) x 3.6811" (D)
Weight: 0.36lb
